Pricing

Hawk provides several plans with different volumes to cover most projects on all stages of growing.

FREE
10 000 events / mo
FREE
BASIC
100 000 events / mo
20 $ / mo
ENTERPRISE
1 000 000 events / mo
200 $ / mo
All plans includes all available features.

Free for non-profit products

Hawk is created by CodeX — team of passionate developers from different universities.

If you want a free unlimited access for non-profit product, contact us by team@hawk.so.
